wiki.occupation: Licensed superhero; [[Project: PEGASUS]] Security Director, vigilante. assistant to syndicate boss
wiki.powers: Joey Cartelli was a natural athlete; since exposure to his belt; Blue natural life force (bio-energy) has been amplified, giving him superhuman strength (lifting 1800 lbs.), his reaction time is 10 times quicker than normal. Joey' stamina and agility were increased as well as his speed, which now allows him to run at 50 mph for short periods. Initially Joey needed his belt for these enhancements, but after years of exposure to its energies, they have become innate.
wiki.abilities: He produces an oscillating bio-energy frequency  that interact with nearby atomic particles to generate a self supporting force field, usually one inch away from his body, although with concentration he can extend it to encompass others within a few feet of him. This field can absorb up to 1000 psi without the Blue Shield being buffeted by the impact, easily blocking knives, bullets and fist, and some electromagnetic phenomena, such as thermal radiation, but it does not stop sound or light.The field glows blue harmless Cherenkov radiation and is imperceptible to touch from within, but feels warm and spongy from the outside. Joey is a proficient fighter who has also studied boxing, judo, and gymnastics
wiki.paraphernalia: Formerly possessed a belt which generated the force field, after some as yet unrevealed mutagenic affect on his genetic structure, Blue Shield now possesses this ability without the belt.
wiki.bio_text: Currently he is the Security Director at [[Project: PEGASUS]]. While in this capacity he has encountered [[Quasar (Wendell Vaughn)|Quasar]], the [[Omnivore]], the [[Squadron Supreme (Earth-712)|Squadron Supreme]], the [[Avengers]], and the [[Corruptor]].He failed to protect Project:Pegasus from the alien life form Omnivore, so he resigned commission as security director. Then later accepted reinstatement as Pegasus security director.
wiki.bio: Currently he is the Security Director at [[Project: PEGASUS]]. While in this capacity he has encountered [[Quasar (Wendell Vaughn)|Quasar]], the [[Omnivore]], the [[Squadron Supreme (Earth-712)|Squadron Supreme]], the [[Avengers]], and the [[Corruptor]].He failed to protect Project:Pegasus from the alien life form Omnivore, so he resigned commission as security director. Then later accepted reinstatement as Pegasus security director.
